    D

    declineAppointment(String, String) - Method in interface appointmentsystem.doctorAppointmentManagement
    Declines an appointment, marking the specified appointment as declined by the doctor.
    declineAppointment(String, String) - Method in class appointmentsystem.DoctorAppointmentManager
    Declines an appointment for the specified doctor, updates the appointment status to "CANCELLED," and maintains the patient-doctor association records.
    doctorAppointmentManagement - Interface in appointmentsystem
    The doctorAppointmentManagement interface defines methods for managing doctor actions on patient appointments, specifically for accepting or declining appointments.
    DoctorAppointmentManager - Class in appointmentsystem
    The DoctorAppointmentManager class manages appointment actions for doctors, such as accepting or declining appointments.
    DoctorAppointmentManager() - Constructor for class appointmentsystem.DoctorAppointmentManager
     
    DoctorAvailability - Class in appointmentsystem
    The DoctorAvailability class allows doctors to set their availability on a given date.
    DoctorAvailability() - Constructor for class appointmentsystem.DoctorAvailability
     
    DoctorInformationAccess - Class in appointmentsystem
    The DoctorInformationAccess class provides doctors with access to view and update the medical records of patients assigned to them.
    DoctorInformationAccess() - Constructor for class appointmentsystem.DoctorInformationAccess
     
    DoctorScheduleView - Class in appointmentsystem
    The DoctorScheduleView class provides functionalities for doctors to view their schedules, including both all appointments and upcoming confirmed appointments.
    DoctorScheduleView() - Constructor for class appointmentsystem.DoctorScheduleView
     
    doctorViewAppointment - Interface in appointmentsystem
    The doctorViewAppointment interface defines methods for viewing a doctor's appointment schedule.
